desc: When style and artistry meet, a beautiful love story unfolds. One where innovative faucets and signature accessories are born. Add an obsession for quality and you know you’re getting the finest materials, finishes and craftsmanship. Only an artisan can create a masterpiece. Only Luxart is fitting for any canvas.

layout.text:
In an all-new Coal Black finish,
that provides a timeless
elegance and adds
character to any
environment!
